scripts.docker:dev:restart: npm run docker:dev:down && npm run docker:dev:up
scripts.docker:dev:clean-restart: npm run docker:dev:clean-down && npm run docker:dev:up
scripts.docker:prod:restart:local: npm run docker:prod:down && npm run docker:prod:up:local
scripts.docker:prod:up:local: export TAG_VERSION=local && export NO_PUSH_DOCKER_IMAGES=true && export NO_PULL_ON_BUILD_BASE_IMAGE=true && set -a && . ./.env && set +a && npm run docker:prod:build-all-sources && npm run docker:prod:build-server-base-image && npm run docker:prod:build-server && npm run docker:prod:up
